metadata.title: THE NORTH FACE Men's Geo NSE Hoodie Sweatshirt
features: EVERYDAY WEAR. With its bold front logo, the Men's Geo NSE Hoodie proudly reminds us to Never Stop Exploring.

STANDARD FIT. With a flattering shape and ample mobility, this hoodie is perfect for easy wear or layering up. Whether for a casual look in town or active days in the wilderness, you'll experience freedom of movement through the shoulders and chest.

PREMIUM FABRIC. Made from a cotton blend, this soft, mid-weight hoodie delivers cozy comfort for nights around the campfire. Easy to wear and care for, you'll love the effortless look and feel anywhere you go.

FUNCTIONAL VERSATILITY. Never Stop Exploring with functional features that help you go further — a two-piece hood with drawcord provides extra coverage and protection against bad weather while a kangaroo front pocket keeps your hands warm on chilly days.

TAKE ON THE DAY. An essential closet staple, this sweatshirt is a go-to classic for hiking, training or just kicking back. Pair it with your favorite shorts or athletic pants and proudly wear the badge of exploration with The North Face.
